title: Intel Core i7-12700K vs AMD Ryzen 7 5800X3D: Which CPU to buy for gaming?
content:
AMD recently announced the launch date and price for its new Ryzen 7 5800X3D CPU, alongside a half-dozen new processors. The Ryzen 7 5800X3D is a top-end chip, which according to AMD, is now the “world’s best gaming processor”. In this article, we’re going to take a look at the Intel Core i7-12700K vs Ryzen

The post Intel Core i7-12700K vs AMD Ryzen 7 5800X3D: Which CPU to buy for gaming? appeared first on xda-developers.
description: In this article, we're going to take a look at the Intel Core i7-12700K vs Ryzen 7 5800X3D comparison to find out which one's better for gaming.
